nodes.text: The Droid Storage Module was a small cargo compartment for droids manufactured by Utilitech. The module could either be magnetically sealed to the exterior of the droid, or installed internally. The modules were small enough to carry objects such as a small blaster, comlink, or datapad.
The Droid Storage Module was often illegally modified to act as a sensor-shielded storage compartment using sensor-absorbent materials to obscure the contents from scans.
